video.title: Small Space, Big Style Collection
video.synopsis: At 1,000 square feet or less, these spaces are small but stylish. Learn how creative homeowners have made the most of their modest surroundings.

episodes.synopsis: From Texas to New York, four homeowners tackle imaginative projects that reflect their personal styles and make the most out of small spaces.
episodes.title: Diminutive Yet Dramatic

episodes.synopsis: From a houseboat to a high-end apartment, smart storage and innovative design make living in small spaces anything but limited.
episodes.title: Small, Smaller, Smallest

episodes.synopsis: Visit an architect's urban tree house in D.C., an environmentally friendly prefab home in San Francisco and a Victorian with a twist in Austin.
episodes.title: Style in the City

episodes.synopsis: See a tiny studio in New York, a historic Alexandria townhouse, a retro Texas condo and a modern redo in Washington, D.C.
episodes.title: Small-Scale Luxury

episodes.synopsis: Tour small spaces that inspire expansive creativity, from an architect's puzzle in New York to an artist's hideaway in Houston.
episodes.title: Inspiration in Close Quarters

episodes.synopsis: Tour a tiny New York walk-up with lots of glamour, a historic Baltimore row house with modern style and a Miami apartment right out of a sci-fi movie.
episodes.title: Tricks of the Trade

episodes.synopsis: Check out a simple and sophisticated space in San Francisco, a tiny industrial bachelor pad in Miami and a hidden office in Oakland.
episodes.title: Small but Spacious

episodes.synopsis: Check out a small pink and green playhouse in Brooklyn, a multi-functional studio in Virginia and a tiny transformed row house in Washington, D.C.
episodes.title: Undersized Utopias

episodes.synopsis: See four small spaces that make a huge impact, including a white-on-white warehouse in Brooklyn and a crafty live-work space in Washington, D.C.
episodes.title: Big Ideas, Tiny Spaces

episodes.synopsis: Step inside an elegant studio in New York, a chic bungalow in Venice Beach and a library on wheels in Washington, D.C.
episodes.title: Small Wonders

episodes.synopsis: Check out a crafty writer's bright Hollywood bungalow, an urban guest house in Chicago and a whole lot of cork in New York.
episodes.title: Ordinary to Extraordinary

episodes.synopsis: Meet an architect who brought Venice style to his L.A. digs and take a tour through northern Europe in a couple's small Washington space.
episodes.title: International Inspiration

episodes.synopsis: See an apartment that seems to float on a cloud. Souvenirs add character to a New York home, and layering lends space to a Chicago pad.
episodes.title: Uncluttered Chic

episodes.synopsis: A small-town couple gets creative in their Big Apple space, while an island bungalow in Washington State gets a major renovation.
episodes.title: Imaginative Designs

episodes.synopsis: An architect finds clever ways to maximize his New York space, and sweet treats become design inspiration for one L.A. couple.
episodes.title: Unique and Untraditional

episodes.synopsis: Two architects make room for entertaining, a college student styles his dorm room, and an antiques dealer mixes modern artwork with Victorian pieces.
episodes.title: First Class Style

episodes.synopsis: Visit a lavender apartment with amazing views in New York, a nautical-inspired home in Boston and a retro-modern space in Philadelphia.
episodes.title: Tiny Treasured Spaces

episodes.synopsis: Explore a townhouse's architectural influences, and meet a young family whose home takes advantage of the surrounding landscape.
episodes.title: Small, but Bold Spaces

episodes.synopsis: Check out a tiny bungalow with Hollywood glamour, a little house with a big dance floor, a modern mini-loft in New York and more.
episodes.title: Do-It-Yourself Charm

episodes.synopsis: A New York apartment is full of hidden storage, a D.C. home boasts an amazing view, and a very modern space is perfect for San Francisco.
episodes.title: Flowing with Style

episodes.synopsis: Tour several unique spaces, including a tiny row house in D.C., a cozy getaway in Lake Placid and an artist's space in Chicago.
episodes.title: Living Small

episodes.synopsis: Space may be a luxury, but style doesn't have to be. Check out an urban cottage in Boston and a designer's tiny, over-the-top apartment in New York.
episodes.title: Clever Spaces

episodes.synopsis: Tour a modern cottage with storage galore in Charlottesville, a tiny New York apartment with major style and a trendy space in Venice, California.
episodes.title: Super Small Storage

episodes.synopsis: See a loft in New York's chic Soho neighborhood transformed from industrial to historic, and step into a beach cottage that's full of colors.
episodes.title: Recycled Style

episodes.synopsis: In Southern California's Topanga Canyon, a rehearsal studio becomes a retreat, while in Tokyo, it's all about living simply.
episodes.title: Small Simplistic Living
